instruction: Himal ko bare ma lekhnu.
output: Himal Nepal ko gaurav ho. Yo parbatko desh ho ra yo sansarma uchcha parbat haru ko ghar ho.

instruction: Nepali khana kasari banaune sikaunu.
output: Daal banuna mas ko daal lai paani ma umaalnu, bhat pakaauna chaamal safaa gare pachhi paani ma rakhera pakaaune, ra tarkari ma alu ra saag miss gari tarkari banaaune.

instruction: Ghumna jana ko lagi Nepal ka ramro thaun haru lekhnu.
output: Pokhara, Kathmandu, Chitwan, Lumbini, Everest Base Camp, Mustang.

instruction: English bata Nepali ma anuvad garna.
output: Timi lai kasto cha?

instruction: Nepali geet ko ek line lekhnu.
output: Resham firiri, resham firiri, uda uda jaane resham firiri.

instruction: Nepal ko rajnaitik vyavastha ko bare ma lekhnu.
output: Nepal ek sanghiya loktantrik ganatantra ho, jasle 2008 ma raja tantra ko antim ghosana gari naya samvidhan anusaar chalaudai cha.

instruction: Timi ko ghar ko bare ma bataunu.
output: Mero ghar Kathmandu ma cha. Yo ek sano, ramro ghar ho ra yahaa mero pariwaar bascha.

instruction: Nepal ko itihaas ko bare ma chhoto ma lekhnu.
output: Nepal ko itihaas malla rajya, shah bamsa, ra loktantrik andolan haru le bharipurna cha.

instruction: Ekdam ramro Nepali mithai ko naam lekhnu.
output: Lalmohan, Rasbari, Yomari, Sel Roti.

instruction: Pani puri kasari banauchha?
output: Pani puri ko lagi alulai masala miss garera gol gappa bhitra rakhera teeto paani ko sang khaane gari banauchha.

instruction: Himal ko mahattwa bare lekhnu.
output: Himal Nepal ko sanskriti, paryatan, ra jalshrot ko mool aadhaar ho. Yo hami sabai ko gaurav ko chihn ho.

instruction: Nepali sahitya ko ek jana prasiddha lekhak ko naam ra unko karya lekhnu.
output: Laxmi Prasad Devkota ek jana prasiddha lekhak hun. Unko prasiddha mahakabya 'Muna Madan' ho.

instruction: Khaja banaune ek sajilo tarika bataunu.
output: Anda fry garera chaamal ko bhat sang khaja ko lagi sajilo ra swadilo upaaya ho.

instruction: Nepal ma manine ek chhuti ko bare ma lekhnu.
output: Dashain Nepal ko sabai bhanda thulo chhuti ho. Yo parva durga mata ko puja ra aashirbad ko rupma manincha.

instruction: Nepal ka kuch prasiddha taal haru ko naam lekhnu.
output: Fewa Taal, Rara Taal, Begnas Taal, Gosaikunda Taal, Tilicho Taal.

instruction: Nepal ko raajdhani ko bare ma jankari dinu.
output: Kathmandu Nepal ko raajdhani ho. Yo prasiddha mandir haru, jasto ki Pashupatinath ra Swayambhunath, le bharipurna sahar ho.

instruction: Nepali bhasha ko vikas kasari bhayo?
output: Nepali bhasha ko vikas shah bamsa ka raja haru le ra gorkhali sena le sambidhan ma dherai prayog garna ko karan bhayo.

instruction: Yatra ko lagi Nepal ma kun mausam sabai bhanda ramro ho?
output: Basanta (March-April) ra Sharad (October-November) Nepal yatra ko lagi sabai bhanda ramro mausam ho.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ma bihana uthne samaya kasto huncha?
output: Nepali sanskriti anusar, bihana chhito uthne, arghya dina, ra puja garnu ramro manincha.

instruction: Nepali lok geet ko udaharan dinu.
output: Resham Firiri, Sorathi, Dohori, ra Tamang Selo Nepali lok geet ka udaharan hun.

instruction: Nepali jana ko dharmik biswas ko bare ma lekhnu.
output: Nepali jana Hindu, Bauddha, ra kirat dharma ma biswas garne janajati hun. Sabai dharma ma shanti ra samanta ko adhar ma jeewan jeewancha.

instruction: Nepali paryatan le desh lai kasari samriddha banauncha?
output: Paryatan le arthik samriddhi, sanskritik sanrakshan, ra rojgariko nirman garna sahayog garcha.

instruction: Ek ramro Nepali kahani ko shuruwaat lekhaun.
output: Ek samaya ko kura ho, ek sano gaun ma ek imanedar kisan basthyo. Usle afno mehnat ra imaandaari le gaun ka sabai manis ko man jitna safal bhayo.

instruction: Nepali topi ko mahatwo lekhnu.
output: Nepali topi hamro rashtriya pahichan ho. Yo Dashain, Tihar, ra anya parva haru ma lagaune gari anivarya chhaya jasto lagcha.

instruction: Nepali kheladi haru ko ek udaharan dinu.
output: Sandeep Lamichhane ek jana prasiddha Nepali cricket kheladi hun, jo ICC le manyata prapt Nepali kheladi ko roop ma prasiddha chhan.

instruction: Nepali pariwaar ma budha-budhaiko mahatwa bare lekhnu.
output: Nepali pariwaarma budha-budhaiko mahatwa ati nai chha. Uniharuko anubhav ra asirbad le pariwaar ekata ma rahanchha.

instruction: Pahad ra Tarai ko bhinnata bare lekhnu.
output: Pahad thado ra thanda huncha, jaba ki Tarai samatal ra garmi huncha. Pahad ma khas ra sherpa jatiko basai chha, ra Tarai ma madhesi ra tharu jatiko basai chha.

instruction: Nepali samajik sanjal haru ko udaharan dinu.
output: Nepali samajik sanjal haruma Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, ra Twitter prasiddha chhan.

instruction: Nepali sabdakosh ko prayojan bare lekhnu.
output: Nepali sabdakosh le tika-tippani ko lagi sahayog garcha, arth samajhna, ra bhasha ko gyan badhauna upyogi chha.

instruction: Nepali thakali khana kasari pakaaune?
output: Thakali khana ko lagi bhat, daal, gundruk ko achar, masu ra saag miss garera pakaaune garnu parchha.

instruction: Nepali itihaas ko ek prasiddha ghatana bare lekhnu.
output: Prithvi Narayan Shah le Nepal ekikaran gariyo, jasma thaun thaun ka chhoto rajya harulai ek samyukta desh banaiyo.

instruction: Nepali chaad parva haruko mahatwa bare lekhnu.
output: Nepali chaad parva haru, jasto ki Dashain, Tihar, ra Teej le sanskritik ekata ra samajik samriddhi ko sandesh dinchha.

instruction: Kathmandu Upatyaka ko sanskritik mahatwa bare lekhnu.
output: Kathmandu Upatyaka UNESCO World Heritage Site ho. Yahaa Pashupatinath, Swayambhunath, ra Durbar Square haru chhan.

instruction: Nepali balbalika ko sikai kasari sudhar garna sakincha?
output: Nepali balbalika ko sikai sudhar garna quality sikshya, digital tools ko upayog, ra abaashik shivira haru awashyak chha.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ko ek udaharan dinu.
output: Nepali sanskriti ko udaharan Swasthani puja, jasma pariwaar sanga basera Swasthani katha sunincha.

instruction: Nepal ma manaiyeko Tihar ko mahatwa bare lekhnu.
output: Tihar Nepali parva ho, jasle diyoko prakash, kukur, gai, ra bhaai ko puja garera prem ra ekata ko sandesh dinchha.

instruction: Nepali khetipati ma prayog hune purano aujar ko naam dinu.
output: Halo, Juwa, Kodalo, Doko, ra Nanglo purano khetipati ka aujar hun.

instruction: Nepal ko prashiddha mandir haruko naam lekhnu.
output: Pashupatinath Mandir, Manakamana Mandir, Swayambhunath, ra Muktinath Mandir prashiddha mandir haru hun.

instruction: Nepali ra angreji bhasha ko antar lekhnu.
output: Nepali bhasha Devanagari lipi ma lekhincha ra vibhakti anusar badalcha. Angreji bhasha Latin lipi ma lekhincha ra sabda ka krama ma niyam chha.

instruction: Nepal ko arthik samriddhi ko lagi ke garnu parcha?
output: Paryatan ko bikash, krishi sudhar, shikshya ra rojgari ko nirman le Nepal ko arthik samriddhi sambhab chha.

instruction: Nepali balbalika ko manobal kasari badhaune?
output: Balbalika lai utsah dina, uniharuko samasya sunnu, ra uniharuko safalta ko prashansa garnu parcha.

instruction: Nepal ma banne mohi ko upayog bare lekhnu.
output: Mohi Nepal ma sharir chiso rakhna, pet bharnu ra gundruk ko achar sang khana upayogi huncha.

instruction: Nepal ko prashiddha pahad haru ko naam dinu.
output: Sagarmatha, Annapurna, Machhapuchhre, ra Dhaulagiri Nepal ka prashiddha pahad haru hun.

instruction: Nepali lok katha ko ek udaharan lekhnu.
output: Ek jana kisan le ek din afno baari ma ek maneko dhunga bhetiyo, junle usko jindagi nai badal diyo.

instruction: Nepali janajatiko ek udaharan ra unko sanskriti bare lekhnu.
output: Sherpa janajati Himal kshetra ma baschha. Unko sanskriti ma Buddha dharma ko mahatwa, mani padne, ra chhorten banaune parampara chha.

instruction: Nepal ma kasari bijuli utpadan garincha?
output: Nepal ma bijuli pramukh rupma jalshrot bata utpadan garincha. Jasta ki, Kaligandaki ra Marsyangdi jalbidhyut yojana.

instruction: Nepal ko prashiddha nadiharu ko naam lekhnu.
output: Koshi, Gandaki, Karnali, Bagmati, ra Rapti Nepal ko prashiddha nadiharu hun.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ma tika ra mala ko mahatwa bare lekhnu.
output: Tika ra mala Nepali sanskriti ma samarpan, asirbad, ra prem ko pratik ho. Yo parva haru ma prayog huncha.

instruction: Ek prasiddha Nepali khel ko naam ra usko niyam lekhnu.
output: Dandi Biyo ek prasiddha Nepali khel ho. Ek dande ra ek biyo ko sahayata le yo khel khelincha, ra biyo lai dande le maaraune garincha.

instruction: Nepal ma prayog hune dharmik pustakharu ko naam dinu.
output: Nepal ma Bhagavad Gita, Ramayan, Mahabharat, ra Tripitaka jasta dharmik pustakharu prayog hun.

instruction: Nepali mohitokri kasari tayar garincha?
output: Mohitokri banuna dahi ra mohi ko miss garera, mitho masala jodaune ra tarkari sang serve garincha.

instruction: Nepali bhasha ma lekhan ko mahatwa bare lekhnu.
output: Nepali bhasha ma lekhan le hami ko sanskriti, itihaas, ra sahitya lai sambalna madat garcha. Yo bhav-prakash ko madhyam ho.

instruction: Nepali lok sanskriti ma pariwartan kasari airaheko cha?
output: Nepali lok sanskriti ma pariwartan shaharikaran, prabidhi, ra pashchatya sanskriti ko prabhav le airaheko chha.

instruction: Nepal ko chhaad haru ma prayog hune kapada ko naam lekhnu.
output: Dashain ra Tihar ma daura suruwal, gunyo cholo, ra dhoti kurta jasto kapada prayog huncha.

instruction: Nepali janajati haru le kasari parva manauchha?
output: Janajati haru le afno paramparagat nach, geet, ra puja garera parva manauchhan. Jasto ki Tamang le Lhosar manauchhan ra Tharu le Maghi manauchhan.

instruction: Nepali khetipati ko abaashyak aujar haru ko bare ma lekhnu.
output: Nepali khetipati ma halo, juwa, kodalo, doko, ra nanglo jasto aujar haru prayog huncha.

instruction: Nepali bhasha ma prashiddha kavi ko naam dinu.
output: Nepali bhasha ma prashiddha kavi Laxmi Prasad Devkota, Lekhnath Poudyal, ra Bhupi Sherchan hun.

instruction: Nepal ko arthik sthiti sudharna ko upaya lekhnu.
output: Nepal ko arthik sthiti sudharna paryatan bikas, krishi sudhar, ra udyog sthapna garna parcha.

instruction: Nepali karyalaya ma prayog hune lekhanka aujar ko naam dinu.
output: Karyalaya ma computer, printer, stapler, file folder, ra calculator ko upayog garincha.

instruction: Nepali school ma siksha ko gunasta kasari sudhar garna sakincha?
output: Digital sikai, sikshyak talim, ra vidyarthi ko aacharak ramro banaera siksha ko gunasta sudhar garna sakincha.

instruction: Nepali dharmik parva ma ghoomphir ko pratha ko bare ma lekhnu.
output: Nepali dharmik parva ma ghoomphir, jasto ki Muktinath ya Pashupatinath jane pratha, aadhyatmik shuddhiko nimti mahattwapurna chha.

instruction: Nepali bal geet ko ek udaharan dinu.
output: Bal geet ko udaharan ho: 'Machha Marna Jaaula, Boksi Bhyaguto Laaula.'

instruction: Nepal ma prayog hune upayogi jadibuti ko naam lekhnu.
output: Yarsa Gumba, Satuwa, Chiraito, ra Bojho Nepal ma upayogi jadibuti hun.

instruction: Nepali lok bhasha ma ek prashiddha kahani ko naam lekhnu.
output: Nepali lok bhasha ma 'Bhedako oon Jasto' ek prashiddha kahani ho.

instruction: Nepal ma manaiyeko ek prasiddha Nach ko naam ra usko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Lakhe Nach Kathmandu ma prasiddha ho, jun Indra Jatra ko samay ma manaiincha. Yo nach le rakshya ra shakti ko pratik darshauchha.

instruction: Nepali khetima bali kasari lagaincha?
output: Nepali khetima bali lageko manchheharu ko mehnat, halo-joti, ra paani ko prayog bata sambhab huncha.

instruction: Nepali parva ma kukur ko puja kasari garincha?
output: Tihar ma Kukur Tihar manaiincha, jas ma kukur ko maala lagai, tika garera, ra mitho khana khuwaera puja garincha.

instruction: Nepali shiksha pranali ma e-learning ko bhumika bare lekhnu.
output: E-learning le Nepali shiksha pranali ma digitization garna sahayog garcha, vidyarthilai anyako biswako gyan samman garna samartha banauchha.

instruction: Nepali lok geet le samudaya ma kasto prabhav pareko chha?
output: Nepali lok geet le samudaya ma ekata, sanskritik gyan, ra manoranjan pradan gareko chha. Yo pariwaar ra samudaya ekikaran ko madhyam ho.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ma mitho chhaad (sweets) ko mahatwa bare lekhnu.
output: Mithai jasto ki laddu, peda, ra sel roti Nepali parva ma sambandha mazboot banaucha ra asirbad ko pratik ho.

instruction: Nepali gaun ma basne manchhe ko jeevan shaili bare lekhnu.
output: Nepali gaun ma basne manchhe simple jeevan jeeunchhan, krishi garna, chara palna ra samajik sambandha mazboot banai baschhan.

instruction: Nepali Himal chhetra ma basne janajati ko ek udaharan ra unko parampara lekhnu.
output: Sherpa janajati Himal chhetra ma baschha. Unko parampara ma Buddha dharma, chhorten banaune ra himal charne sanskriti sammalit chha.

instruction: Nepali bhasha ko samrakshan kasari garna sakincha?
output: Nepali bhasha ko samrakshan ko lagi shiksha ma prayog, lok geet ko sanrakshan, ra digital content ma Nepali prayog badhauna parcha.

instruction: Nepali Himalay ma paryatan le kasari arthik sudhar lyauchha?
output: Nepali Himalay ma paryatan le hotel, guide, ra yatra sambandhi karyalaya ko rojgariko awasar badhaune kaam garcha.

instruction: Nepali samajik ekta badhauna ke garnu parcha?
output: Nepali samajik ekta ko lagi sabai jat ra dharma lai sammana garna, samajik karyakram badhauna, ra vyakti ma sambandha majbooti banauna parcha.

instruction: Nepali rastra ko ek mahatwapurna samjhauta bare lekhnu.
output: Sugauli Sandhi ek mahatwapurna samjhauta ho, jasma Nepal le afno thulo bhagko bhubhag bitnu parcha thiyo.

instruction: Nepali balbalika ma shiksha ko mahatwa bare lekhnu.
output: Nepali balbalika ko lagi shiksha jindagi ko mul aadhar ho, junle gyan, sanskar, ra self-dependency sikhauchha.

instruction: Nepali gaunghar ma prashiddha khel ko naam dinu.
output: Chungi, Dandi Biyo, ra Kabbadi Nepali gaunghar ma prashiddha khel haru hun.

instruction: Nepali prashiddha taal haru ma ke garna sakincha?
output: Fewa Taal ma boat ride garna, Rara Taal ma paryatan garna, ra Tilicho Taal ko himal drishya herna sakincha.

instruction: Nepal ko praachin itihaas ko ek udaharan lekhnu.
output: Praachin Nepal ma Lichchhavi kal ma Mandir nirmaan, dharmik punarjagaran ra shilalekh ko samriddhi thiyo.

instruction: Nepali jagat ma prasiddha ek jana khiladi ko naam ra unko yogdan lekhnu.
output: Sandeep Lamichhane Nepali cricket team ka prasiddha khiladi hun, junle Nepal lai antarashtriya cricket ma prashiddhi dilaye.

instruction: Nepali paryatan kshetra ma aaja kalako chunauti bare lekhnu.
output: Nepali paryatan kshetra ma jalanjot, prachuran sambhawana ko abhav, ra covid-19 le prabhavit gareko chunauti chha.

instruction: Nepali lok geet le sanskriti ko bare ma k ke prastut garcha?
output: Nepali lok geet le hami ko samajik sanskriti, prem, pariwaar ko sambandha ra itihaas lai prastut garcha.

instruction: Nepali paryatan ko bikash kasari garna sakincha?
output: Nepali paryatan bikash ko lagi naya sadak banaune, hotel ko suvidha badhaune, ra antarashtriya campaign suru garna parcha.

instruction: Nepali thulo mandir haru ko naam ra thau lekhnu.
output: Pashupatinath Mandir (Kathmandu), Muktinath Mandir (Mustang), Manakamana Mandir (Gorkha), ra Janaki Mandir (Janakpur) thulo mandir haru hun.

instruction: Nepali parva haru ma najikai puraiyekopari kin asirbad linu parcha?
output: Nepali parva haru ma najikai puraiyekopari asirbad liyera manawik sambandha mazboot banaucha ra paramparagat sanskar ko samman huncha.

instruction: Nepali janajati haru ko paramparagat geet haru ko udaharan lekhnu.
output: Gurung haru ko Rodhi geet, Magar haru ko Sorathi geet, ra Tamang haru ko Tamang Selo prasiddha geet haru hun.

instruction: Nepal ma sanrakshan garna parne ek jaibik bibidhata ko udaharan lekhnu.
output: Nepal ma Red Panda, Snow Leopard, ra Gharial sanrakshan garna parne jaibik bibidhata ka udaharan hun.

instruction: Nepali lok geet ko pramukh bisay haru bare lekhnu.
output: Nepali lok geet ma prem, prakriti, krishi, ra samajik sambandha ka bisayharu sambodhit huncha.

instruction: Nepal ma barsha ritu ko mahattwa bare lekhnu.
output: Barsha ritu Nepal ko krishi ko lagi atyanta mahatwapurna ho, kinabhane yo samay ma khetipati garna ramro huncha.

instruction: Nepali rajnitik paribartan ma ek pramukh ghatna ko udaharan dinu.
output: Nepali rajnitik paribartan ma 2007 sal ko Prajatantra ko sthapana ek pramukh ghatna ho.

instruction: Nepali Himal ma padhne yaatra ko laagi tayari kasari garincha?
output: Nepali Himal ko yaatra ma ramro kapada, jadibuti, pahadi bato ko jankari, ra local guide ko sahayata liyera tayari garincha.

instruction: Nepali bhasha ma ek ramailo katha ko naam ra tyo katha ko saar lekhnu.
output: 'Jhilmilko Sathi' ek ramailo katha ho, jasle mitrata ra sahayog ko mulya sikhauchha.

instruction: Nepali balbalika haru ma sikai kasari badhauna sakincha?
output: Khel-kud ko madhyam, digital tools, ra prashnottar ko prayog bata Nepali balbalika ma sikai badhauna sakincha.

instruction: Nepali lok sanskriti ko ek udaharan ra tyo sanskriti ko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Ghatu nach ek udaharan ho, jun lok sanskriti ma paramparagat naach ra geet ko samyojan garcha, ra sanskritik pehchaan banauchha.

instruction: Nepali krishi ma prayog hune ek modern technique ko bare lekhnu.
output: Drip irrigation ek modern technique ho, junle paani ko durupyog roki khetipati ko utpadan badhaunchha.

instruction: Nepali bal geet haru ko bisheshata lekhnu.
output: Nepali bal geet haru sajilo bhasha ma hunchha, shikshya ra manoranjan ko samyojan garcha, ra sanskritik sandesh dincha.

instruction: Nepali gaun ma prayog hune ek aadhunik tool lekhnu.
output: Power tiller Nepali gaun ma prayog hune ek aadhunik tool ho, junle khetipati ma samay ra shram ko bachat garcha.

instruction: Nepal ma tibbat sangko byaapar kasari huncha?
output: Nepal ma tibbat sang dukaan ko maal, jadibuti, ra pashmina jasta samagri ko byaapar pariwahan dwar garincha.

instruction: Nepali jana ra samaj ma tika ko prayog bare lekhnu.
output: Nepali jana ra samaj ma tika ko prayog shubha asirbad ko roop ma huncha, parva, puja, ra sanskar ma yo mahatwapurna chha.

instruction: Nepali Himal ma prashiddha ek parvat ko naam lekhnu.
output: Sagarmatha (Everest) Nepali Himal ma prashiddha parvat ho, jun biswako sabai bhanda uncha himal ho.

instruction: Nepali shahar ma rahar ko karyakramharu ko udaharan lekhnu.
output: Nepali shahar ma Food Festival, Craft Mela, ra Music Concert jasta rahar ka karyakramharu garincha.

instruction: Nepali itihas ma ek prasiddha vyakti ra unko yogdan lekhnu.
output: Prithvi Narayan Shah Nepali itihas ma prasiddha vyakti hun, junle Nepal ko ekikaran garna mahattwapurna bhumika khele.

instruction: Nepali samudaya ma samajik sadbhawana kasari badhauna sakincha?
output: Samudaya karyakram, antar-dharma sammelan, ra sikshya madhyam bata samajik sadbhawana badhauna sakincha.

instruction: Nepali Himal chhetra ko ek prasiddha taal ko naam ra usko visheshta lekhnu.
output: Tilicho Taal Nepali Himal chhetra ko ek prasiddha taal ho, jun biswako sabai bhanda unchai ma avasthit taal ho.

instruction: Nepali khetipati ko lagi manaiyeko ek parva ko naam ra usko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Asar 15 (Ropain Jatra) kisanharu ko parva ho, junle khetipati suru garne abasar ko rup ma manaiincha.

instruction: Nepali balbalika lai sikshya ma sahayak huney ek digital tool ko naam ra usko prayog lekhnu.
output: E-Paath Nepali balbalika ko lagi ek digital tool ho, junle sikshya materials lai interactive banaunchha.

instruction: Nepali parvatiya kshetra ma basne ek janajati ra unko jeevan shaili lekhnu.
output: Gurung janajati Nepali parvatiya kshetra ma baschhan, unko jeevan shaili krishi, pashupalan, ra ghumi-ghumi karyarath basai ma adharit chha.

instruction: Nepali dharmik sthalamadhye ek ko naam ra usko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Muktinath Mandir Nepali dharmik sthalamadhye ek ho, jun Hindu ra Buddhist dharma ka anuyayi ko lagi pavitra thau ho.

instruction: Nepali lok git le Nepali sanskriti ma kasto yogdan dincha?
output: Nepali lok git le sanskritik pehchaan pradan garcha, samajik sambandha badhaunchha, ra purano parampara lai samrakshan garcha.

instruction: Nepali khadya samskriti ko ek udaharan ra tyo dish ko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Dal Bhat Tarkari Nepali khadya samskriti ko ek mahatwapurna dish ho, jun dinbhar ko urja ko mukhya srot ho.

instruction: Nepali thulo bhukampa ko ek udaharan ra tyo le prabhavit kshetra lekhnu.
output: 2015 ko Gorkha Bhukampa ek thulo bhukampa ho, junle Kathmandu, Sindhupalchok, ra Dolakha lai dherai prabhavit garayo.

instruction: Nepali lok sanskriti ma sammilit ek prasiddha nach ra usko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Sakela Nach Rai janajati ko prasiddha lok sanskriti ho, jun parva ma sanskritik ekta ra khushi prakat garcha.

instruction: Nepali parvat tatha himal ma hone ek adventure karyakram ra usko laabh lekhnu.
output: Trekking Nepali parvat tatha himal ma prachalit ek adventure karyakram ho, junle paryatan ko bikas garna madad garcha.

instruction: Nepali nadi haru ko pramukh upayog lekhnu.
output: Nepali nadi haru ko upayog jal bidyut utpadan, kheti ko sinchai, ra yatra pariwahan ma huncha.

instruction: Nepali balbalika haru ma pustak padne prabriti kasari badhauna sakincha?
output: Library ko suruwat, bal katha pustak haru ko distribution, ra padhai prati utsah badhauna karyakram garda badhauna sakincha.

instruction: Nepali samudaya ma sammilit ek mahan karya ra tyo ko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Chhaya Center ko nirman Nepali samudaya ko ek mahan karya ho, jasle samudaya karyakram ra sanskritik pradarshan ko suvidha dincha.

instruction: Nepali Himal ma ek prasiddha yatra ra tyo yatra ko anubhav lekhnu.
output: Annapurna Base Camp Yatra prasiddha yatra ho, junle swargiya drishya, himal ko shitalta, ra adventure ko anubhav dincha.

instruction: Nepali samajik sadbhawana ka ek udaharan ra tyo le dine sandesh lekhnu.
output: Dashain ek udaharan ho, junle sabai dharma, jat ra samajik pichhadiyaharulai ekatrit garne sandesh dincha.

instruction: Nepali janata ma ramailo garnai mahan parva ko naam ra usko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Holi Nepali janata ko ramailo garnai parva ho, jun rang ra prem ko utsav ho.

instruction: Nepali prashasan ko ek sudhar ra tyo ko prabhav lekhnu.
output: E-Governance ko suruwat ek sudhar ho, jasle janata ko sewa prapti prakriya sajilo ra chhito banauchha.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ma ek dharmik uthsav ra usko visheshta lekhnu.
output: Indra Jatra ek dharmik uthsav ho, jun Hindu ra Buddhist dharma ko sammelan ra samuhik utsav ko rup ma manaiincha.

instruction: Nepali balbalika ma sikai ko lagi ramailo karyakram ra usko laabh lekhnu.
output: Bal Diwas karyakram sikai ko lagi ramailo karyakram ho, junle balbalika ko creativity badhaune kaam garcha.

instruction: Nepali samaj ma sabai bhanda prachin sanskritik drishya pradarshan karyakram ko naam lekhnu.
output: Kumari Jatra Nepali samaj ko prachin sanskritik drishya pradarshan karyakram ho, junle jivan ko pavitrata ko pratik darshauchha.

instruction: Nepali sahitya ko ek prasiddha lekhan ra usko lekhak ko naam lekhnu.
output: Muna Madan Bhanu Bhakta Acharya ko prasiddha lekhan ho, jun Nepali sahitya ko amar karya ho.

instruction: Nepali shikshya pranali ko ek sudhar ra tyo sudhar ko prabhav lekhnu.
output: CBT (Competency-Based Curriculum) sudhar ho, jasle bidyarthiko gyan badhaune practical approach ko prayog garcha.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ma ek paramparagat bhawan ko naam ra usko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Nyatapola Mandir Bhaktapur ko paramparagat bhawan ho, jasle Nepali kala ra vastukala ko mahatwa darshauchha.

instruction: Nepali balbalika ma ethical values sikhna ko lagi ek karyakram ko naam ra usko laabh lekhnu.
output: Moral Science Workshop ek karyakram ho, jasle balbalika ma ramro charitra ko nirman garcha.

instruction: Nepali parvat ma ek himal ko naam ra tyo ko tourism ma yogdan lekhnu.
output: Annapurna Himal Nepali parvat ko prasiddha himal ho, jun trekking tourism ko mukhya ghatak ho.

instruction: Nepali gramin kshetra ma upalabdha ek awashyak sewa ra tyo ko laabh lekhnu.
output: Telemedicine Nepali gramin kshetra ma upalabdha ek sewa ho, junle durgamit thau ma swasthya suvidha dina madad garcha.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ma prachalit ek prasiddha rang ra usko pratik ko bare lekhnu.
output: Lal rang Nepali sanskriti ma prasiddha ho, jun shakti, prem ra utsav ko pratik ho.

instruction: Nepali nadi ko ek naam ra tyo ko upayog lekhnu.
output: Koshi Nadi Nepali ko ek mukhya nadi ho, jun jalbidyut, kheti, ra sinchai ma upayogi chha.

instruction: Nepali parva ma ek prasiddha mithai ra tyo ko mahattwa lekhnu.
output: Laddu Nepali parva ma prasiddha mithai ho, jun subha abasar ma mitrata ra khushi badhauna prayog huncha.

instruction: Nepali lok kala ma ek prasiddha kala ra usko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Mithila Kala prasiddha lok kala ho, jun Nepali samudaya ko pehchaan ra sanskritik pradarshan ko madhyam ho.

instruction: Nepali samaj ma ek samajik sudhar ko udaharan ra tyo ko prabhav lekhnu.
output: Chhaupadi pratha ko samapti ek samajik sudhar ho, jasle mahila swasthya ra adhikar ko samrakshan garcha.

instruction: Nepali parvat ma trekking ka lagi ek jaruri sujhaw lekhnu.
output: Ramro boot, warm kapada, ra pani puriyera lejancha trekking ko lagi jaruri ho.

instruction: Nepali balbalika haru ko lagi ek ramailo khel ko naam ra tyo khel ko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Ghato Bhato balbalika ko ramailo khel ho, junle teamwork ra strategy ko sikai dincha.

instruction: Nepali dharmik puja ma sammilit ek pramukh samagri ra usko upayog lekhnu.
output: Tika Nepali dharmik puja ma mukhya samagri ho, jun asirbad ra pavitrata ko pratik ho.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ma ek prasiddha lokgeet ra usko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Resham Firiri prasiddha lokgeet ho, jun Nepali parvatiya jeevan ra prem ko chhabi pradarshan garcha.

instruction: Nepali janata ma shikshya ko mahatwa bare ek sandesh lekhnu.
output: Shikshya jeevan ko aadhar ho; yo pragati, samriddhi ra samajik sudhar ko marg ho.

instruction: Nepali mahila haru ko udhaharansil yogdan ra tyo yogdan ko prabhav lekhnu.
output: Pasang Lhamu Sherpa ko yogdan Nepali mahila ko sahas ra samarthya ko pratik ho, junle parvatiya paryatan ko prachaar garcha.

instruction: Nepali samaj ma ek dharmik gramin karyakram ra tyo karyakram ko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Deusi-Bhailo ek dharmik gramin karyakram ho, jun Tihar ma mitrata ra samuhik anand ko roop ma manaiincha.

instruction: Nepali itihas ko ek pramukh yuddha ra tyo yuddha ko parinam lekhnu.
output: Anglo-Nepal Yuddha ek pramukh itihasik yuddha ho, junle Sugauli Sandhi ko janma diyeko thiyo.

instruction: Nepali gramin jeevan ko ek udaharan ra usma sammilit samasya lekhnu.
output: Nepali gramin jeevan ma jala ko kami ek samasya ho, jasle kheti ra dinacharya prabhavit garcha.

instruction: Nepali gaun ma ek pramukh samajik anushasan ra tyo ko prabhav lekhnu.
output: Pani ko upayog ko niyam Nepali gaun ma samajik anushasan ko ek pramukh udaharan ho, jun le jal ko durupyog rokcha ra sabai ko sukhad jeevan ko samarthan garcha.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ma ek prasiddha geet ra usko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Sambodhan geet Nepali sanskriti ko ek prasiddha geet ho, junle sambodhan ra samman ko mahatwa darshauchha.

instruction: Nepali itihas ko ek mahattwapurna ghatna ra tyo ghatna ko parinam lekhnu.
output: 1950 ko Nepal-India Samjhauta ek mahattwapurna ghatna ho, jun le Nepal ko swatantrata ko rakshan garna madad garyo.

instruction: Nepali parva haru ma ek prasiddha anand ra tyo ko anand ko prabhav lekhnu.
output: Dashain parva Nepali parva haru ma prasiddha ho, junle janata ma samajik ekata ra anand ko bhawna jagauchha.

instruction: Nepali bhasha ma ek prasiddha word ra uska artha lekhnu.
output: 'Namaste' ek prasiddha Nepali sabda ho, junko artha ho 'timi lai namra abhinandan'.

instruction: Nepali lok geet haru ko ek udaharan ra tyo ko samajik mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Phool ko aankhama Nepali lok geet ho, jun le manav sambandha ra prem ko mahatwa ko prashansha garcha.

instruction: Nepali samaj ma ek samajik karyakram ra tyo karyakram ko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Blood donation camp ek samajik karyakram ho, jasle samajik badhai ra manav seva ko prachaar garcha.

instruction: Nepali shahar ma ek prasiddha yatra ra tyo ko prabhav lekhnu.
output: Lumbini Yatra ek prasiddha yatra ho, junle dharmik tourism ko prachaar garna madad garyo.

instruction: Nepali gramin kshetra ma ek prasiddha fasal ra tyo fasal ko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Maize (Makai) Nepali gramin kshetra ko ek prasiddha fasal ho, jun le gramin arthavyavastha ma mahatwapurna yogdan dincha.

instruction: Nepali parva haru ko ek udaharan ra tyo parva ko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Tihar ek udaharan ho, jun Nepali sanskriti ma diyako roshni ko parva ho, jo ghar parivar ko ekata ra anand ko sandesh dincha.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ma ek lok kaam ko udaharan ra tyo kaam ko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Kumari Puja Nepali sanskriti ko ek lok kaam ho, jun le shakti ko pratima ko roop ma Kumari devi ko poojan garcha.

instruction: Nepali janata ko jeevan ma ek pariwartan ko udaharan ra tyo ko prabhav lekhnu.
output: Loktantra ko sthapana 1990 ko ek mahattwapurna pariwartan ho, jasle Nepal ko rajnitik dasha ra janata ko adhikar ma badalav le ayo.

instruction: Nepali gramin kshetra ma ek pramukh sanskritik ghatna ra tyo ko prabhav lekhnu.
output: Maghi Parva ek sanskritik ghatna ho, jasle Nepali gramin kshetra ma ekata ra samudayik bhawna ko janma dincha.

instruction: Nepali shikshya pranali ko ek sudhar ra tyo ko laabh lekhnu.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ma ek prasiddha nach ra tyo nach ko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Sakela Nach ek prasiddha lok nach ho, junle samajik ekata ra sanskritik virasat ko samarthan garcha.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ma ek lok dholak ra usko prayog lekhnu.
output: Dholak Nepali lok sanskriti ko ek prasiddha musical instrument ho, jun dharmik ra samajik samaroha ma prayog huncha.

instruction: Nepali bhasha ma ek prasiddha vaakya ra tyo ko artha lekhnu.
output: 'Sambodhan ho' ek prasiddha Nepali vaakya ho, junle samman ra abhinandan ko artha garcha.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ma ek prasiddha katha ra tyo katha ko sandesh lekhnu.
output: 'Muna Madan' ek prasiddha katha ho, junle prem, samarpan ra sanskritik dharohar ko mahatwa darshauchha.

instruction: Nepali prashasan ma ek sudhar ra tyo sudhar ko prabhav lekhnu.
output: Local Governance Act ek sudhar ho, jasle gaun ra nagar ko prashasan ko gati ko sudhar garcha.

instruction: Nepali mahila haru ko ek prasiddha udaharan ra tyo ko samajik yogdan lekhnu.

instruction: Nepali dharmik parva ko ek udaharan ra tyo ko mahatwa lekhnu.

instruction: Nepali gramin jeevan ma ek mahatwapurna samasya ra tyo ko samadhan lekhnu.
output: Bikas ko kami ek mahatwapurna samasya ho, jasle gramin kshetra ko pragati rokaunu parcha. Isko samadhan garne kaam ma sadbhawana ra samarthan ko jarurat chha.

instruction: Nepali prachin kala ko ek udaharan ra tyo ko mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Mithila kala ek prachin Nepali kala ho, jun le rang ra bhavana ko madhyam bata samajik ra sanskritik sandesh dincha.

instruction: Nepali sanskritik virasat ko ek pramukh sthala ra tyo ko mahatwa lekhnu.

instruction: Nepali shailee ko ek prasiddha fashion ra tyo ko samajik mahatwa lekhnu.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ko ek prasiddha kala ko udaharan ra usko prabhav lekhnu.
output: Thangka painting ek prasiddha Nepali kala ho, jun le dharmik anubhav ra samajik dharohar ko darshan dincha.

instruction: Nepali lokgeet haru ko ek udaharan ra tyo ko samajik mahatwa lekhnu.
output: Sambodhan geet Nepali lokgeet ho, jun le samajik ekata ra mel ko sandesh dincha.

instruction: Nepali itihas ma ek pramukh jang ko udaharan ra tyo jang ko prabhav lekhnu.
output: Nepali prajatantra ko sthapana ko samayeko jang ek pramukh itihasik ghatna ho, jasle Nepal ko rajnitik samaj ko sudhar garyo.

instruction: Nepali yatra ko ek udaharan ra tyo yatra ko anubhav lekhnu.
output: Everest Base Camp Yatra ek prasiddha yatra ho, jun le manav sahas ra himalayan drishya ko anubhav garne sujhav garcha.

instruction: Nepali lokchha ma ek prasiddha mithai ra tyo ko anand lekhnu.
output: Sweets like Ladoo are an important part of Nepali festivals, bringing joy and representing cultural celebration.

instruction: Nepali bachat ko ek udaharan ra tyo ko mahatwa lekhnu.

instruction: Nepali rajyo ko ek udaharan ra uska sanskritik prabhav lekhnu.
output: Gorkha rajya ek prasiddha rajya ho, jun le Nepal ko sanskritik mahatwa ra veerata ko mahatwa lekhcha.

instruction: Nepali sanskriti ka ek ek prakriya ko naam ra tyo ko prabhav lekhnu.
output: Shaheed Diwas ek samajik mahatwa ko prakriya ho, jun le shaheedharu ko aadar ra sanman ko mahatwa darshauchha.

instruction: Nepali prasiddha jagah ko ek udaharan ra tyo ko prabhav lekhnu.
output: Pokhara Nepal ko ek prasiddha paryatan sthal ho, jun le tourist attraction badhaune kaam garcha.

instruction: Nepali ek pramukh aadi sadah ho ra samajik anushasan ka udaharan ko thau dene ko lekhnu.
output: Buddhist Monasteries are integral to Nepali culture as they spread wisdom to everyone and act as retreats for mental peace.

instruction: Nepali dharmik parampara haru ka ek mahatwa ko udaharan ko ra samajik prabhav lekhnu.
